claims.rationale: Template partitioner - user must edit and promote

exploration.note: proposal_id is exploration-only and MUST NOT appear in attestation

authority_basis.explanation: 1 PA claim(s) accepted via user attestation. PA claims are authority-bearing but not mechanically verified.

trust_class_breakdown.FV: Formally Verified - requires machine-checkable proof (v0: not implemented)
trust_class_breakdown.MV: Mechanically Validated - checked by arithmetic validator
trust_class_breakdown.PA: Procedurally Attested - user attestation, not mechanically verified
trust_class_breakdown.ADV: Advisory - exploration only, excluded from authority stream
